Reviews.Title: great hdtv
Reviews.Author: ustin
Reviews.Content: this is the first hdtv i've purchased and i'm pleasantly surprised. the picture quality is amazing, the dual hdmi hookups allow two hd devices to be connected at once, and its extremely easy to set up. the sound was really weak at first but after tweaking it a little, its better than my old tv. i would reccomend this tv for those who have smaller living rooms, as the screen is only 24.5 inches wide, or for those looking to purchase a nice bedroom tv.

ProductInfo.Name: LED29B30RQ 29" 720p 60Hz Class LED LCD HDTV- RCA
